title: I am loving playing Syndra. Should I bother getting Viktor at some point?
body:
I have found my new main; Syndra.

At one point I really wanted Viktor, but I'm now wondering if Viktor would bring anything that Syndra doesn't. 
Syndra has as good of a stun, if not a much better one. Tons of damage. And more fun skillshots. She also feels very smooth to play with her abilities that can be cast while moving.
Should I pick up Viktor for fun at some point? or will he feel like a less fun, and possibly less powerful, Syndra?

replies.body:
Viktor is fairly strong, and I'd say just as strong as Syndra, it's just Syndra's currently more "popular" due to more recent LCS play.
Viktor's better at waveclear and AoE control/damage while Syndra nukes just about any one single target.

I'm a Viktor fan, only second to Ziggs as he's always been my baby. Viktor does require more mechanics both in E placement and his ult but both skills have amazing damage output and wave clear potential. At the very least I suggest picking him up at some point for those games when Syndra is banned or picked already.
there are 132 other champs ... you should get them all and play them all

They are both kite mages but I prefer syndra.

Might be a nice change of pace here and there.
